Description:
Modern Low Maintenance Living. Enjoy from day One
Near new this modern low maintenance family home is ideal for the busy family, or excellent opportunity for the investor. Features include 3 bedrooms, walk in robe and ensuite to main, built in robes to the other bedrooms, formal lounge at the front of the home and large open plan living towards the rear. The spacious living area includes modern kitchen with dishwasher, pantry and breakfast bar, adjoining meals and family areas plus ducted heating and cooling throughout. Other features Include a 3 piece family bathroom, laundry and extra storage off the passage. From inside to out the home includes a double garage with internal access to the home, and from the living area there is access to the paved entertaining area all situated on a low maintenance landscaped allotment. Positioned in Kangaroo Flat and only a short walk to Centro Plaza, Bunnings, excellent shopping, schools and transport, plus the added bonus of being on the Melbourne side of town. Ideal for the modern family with functional open plan spaces, yet easy low maintenance living; and for the investor a modern established home ready to go.
Insights: 18 May Street, Kangaroo Flat VIC 3555 was last sold in 2018 and 137 other 3 bedroom house in Kangaroo Flat have recently been sold.

Description:
STYLISH LOW MAINTENANCE LIVING
This lovely low maintenance family home is sure to impress even the most discerning buyer. The home features a lovely neutral décor throughout. The spacious kitchen with ample bench and storage space adjoins the open plan meals and family area and overlooks the external covered patio area. You will also find a separate lounge, master with ensuite and built in robe and two other bedrooms both with built in robes. This property is in great condition both inside and out and offers a great investment opportunity if you're looking to grow your portfolio.

Description:
Ready to live or refresh!
In the heart of Kangaroo Flat, in an ideal location, sits this great low maintenance home. Close to local schools, the Kangaroo Flat town centre, Lansell Square and the soon to be built Kangaroo Flat Aquatic Centre, this great home is in a perfect location. Families, first home buyers or those looking for a project would suit this home.
The spacious family room is a perfect place to relax and unwind with it opening into the dining and kitchen areas. The kitchen has great bench and cupboard space with a fairly new cooktop and overlooks the yard.
All 3 bedrooms are of generous size and feature built in robes with plenty of storage space. The family bathroom has a large bath and shower with a vanity with storage and inside the laundry you will find a large built in cupboard, stainless steel sink and rear access.
The home is heated and cooled by gas heating and electric cooler. A lovely colour scheme runs throughout the home giving this home charm.
Outside is a great feature, boasting a large grassed area with trees and plants decorating. The options for the yard are endless. The perfect yard being so low maintenance.
The home is fully fenced and secure and has a single carport with multiple car spaces available.
If you're hunting a home that has little maintenance or a property you can bring life to, this one could be for you.

Description:
FANTASTIC HOME IN QUIET LOCATION
Nestled away in a quiet court location is where you will find this fantastic brick veneer home. Offering three bedrooms all with built in robes, spacious lounge with gas heating, family two way bathroom including claw foot bath, separate shower and timber vanity, kitchen/dining with gas hot plates, electric oven, rangehood and breakfast bar plus a laundry with built in storage. Set on a generous size secure allotment over 800 sq mts outside you will find a paved outdoor entertaining area, double carport with rear access to the colorbond workshop with concrete floor and power. Situated with easy access to everything that Kangaroo Flat has to offer.

BUY IT, BETTER IT, BENEFIT!
Located on a quiet street, this weatherboard construction 3 bedroom home is a great opportunity for investors, renovators or first home buyers, featuring built in robes and generous lounge with gas heating and refrigerated cooling. Open plan kitchen/meals offers ample storage and gas stove. Offering side access to the large yard and shed/workshop, plus expansive rear undercover deck and a large aviary easily converted to further outdoor entertaining. Large 708sqm allotment offers plenty of space for the kids and the dog to run around! Storage room also for boat, trailer or caravan.
Close to schools, sport clubs, Kangaroo Flat train station, recreation reserve and shopping, this home is great value for money.

Description:
Fully renovated family home
Recently redesigned in sophisticated contemporary style, this property has been superbly upgraded on every level, not merely cosmetic. Repainted, recarpeted, new floating timber floors and window furnishings only begin the list of refurbishments. A stunning kitchen surrounds a Miele dishwasher and 900mm stove, incorporating small appliance cupboard and soft-close cabinetry. Stainless steel ceiling fans, along with ducted gas heating and evaporative cooling, maintain temperatures in 2 living zones and 4 bedrooms. Opposite the main, the 4th bedroom makes an ideal quiet study or nursery. A rather suave ensuite has an extra-large shower, as well as abundant built-in storage which is a feature found right throughout the interior. Even the laundry has been thoroughly planned from hampers to high cupboards to keep chemicals out of reach from little hands.
Able to cover quite a gathering, an immense alfresco entertaining area is also a huge addition to the home as sheltered outdoor living, providing a sun-safe place to relax and play. Keeping kiddies and furrier family members safe, the yard is fully-fenced and other secluded garden nooks offer quiet retreats too. Grounds are aptly landscaped to suit busy modern lifestyles and local weather conditions. Sensibly positioned, the double carport over the front door with a bee-line to the kitchen is perfect for grocery shopping, and the 5.5x3.7 metre shed is handy for varied hobbies. It's just a short walk to school, college and bus into shopping, train station, CBD, sports, community and medical facilities. Reap all the rewards of an outstanding rejuvenation - simply inspect, purchase and move in!

Description:
BUSH SETTING CLOSE TO ALL AMENITIES
Surprisingly spacious western red cedar residence was designed to take advantage of the large, sloping bush block approx. 933m².
Set in a leafy, quiet street opposite natural bushland, the property offers a semi-bush lifestyle while only a five minute drive to all Kangaroo Flat amenities.
The split-level residence features timber-lined raked ceilings with exposed beams and polished timber floors underfoot. It includes three robed bedrooms; two located handy to the bathroom and the main with en-suite, built-in robe and sliding door access to the rear deck, on the lower level.
Expansive open-plan living areas include spacious living room opening to the deck, large dining area with study nook and kitchen overlooking the garden. Gas cooktop and electric oven take care of cooking duties and a Bosch dishwasher makes cleaning up a breeze while split system air conditioning and gas heating maintain the internal climate .
The extensive covered deck is the perfect place to relax, unwind and take in the patchwork garden of native shrubs and gum trees amid winding paths and a tranquil fishpond.
Outbuildings include single and double carports, garden shed and an open shed at the bottom of the garden.
If you enjoy the quiet life, this unique property is a must-see. Imagine living in the serene setting where you can wake up to the sounds of the birds and the breeze whispering in the gum trees.
Insights: 2 Lowe Street, Kangaroo Flat VIC 3555 was last sold in 2020 and 137 other 3 bedroom house in Kangaroo Flat have recently been sold.

Description:
BUSH SETTING CLOSE TO ALL AMENITIES
Surprisingly spacious western red cedar residence was designed to take advantage of the large, sloping bush block approx. 933m².
Set in a leafy, quiet street opposite natural bushland, the property offers a semi-bush lifestyle while only a five minute drive to all Kangaroo Flat amenities.
The split-level residence features timber-lined raked ceilings with exposed beams and polished timber floors underfoot. It includes three robed bedrooms; two located handy to the bathroom and the main with en-suite, built-in robe and sliding door access to the rear deck, on the lower level.
Expansive open-plan living areas include spacious living room opening to the deck, large dining area with study nook and kitchen overlooking the garden. Gas cooktop and electric oven take care of cooking duties and a Bosch dishwasher makes cleaning up a breeze while split system air conditioning and gas heating maintain the internal climate .
The extensive covered deck is the perfect place to relax, unwind and take in the patchwork garden of native shrubs and gum trees amid winding paths and a tranquil fishpond.
Outbuildings include single and double carports, garden shed and an open shed at the bottom of the garden.
If you enjoy the quiet life, this unique property is a must-see. Imagine living in the serene setting where you can wake up to the sounds of the birds and the breeze whispering in the gum trees.

Description:
Exceptional Levels of Luxury
The outstanding design of this sophisticated classic residence, enhanced by exemplary attention to detail, delivers spaces that meet today's - and tomorrow's - needs with a fabulous mixture of style and substance. The tiled floor of an elegant entrance lead to living/dining areas of impressive size, accompanied by the open plan kitchen, Fisher & Paykel appliances and further additional living and dining spaces.
Four generous bedrooms, 2 beautiful bathrooms and separate powder room provide superlative accommodation to a home that also offers additional upstairs living utilised as a dedicated cinema room.
A secure, oversized double garage with internal access concludes a peerless property in a prestigious pocket conveniently close to Lansell Square, Rocklea homemaker centre and an array of schools.
Notable features include:
- 9-foot ceilings
- Zoned electric under floor heating
- Wood heater
- Evaporative cooling
- Ducted vacuuming
- Decorative cornices
- Duel vanities in both bathrooms
- Laundry shoot on the upper level
- 3x3m shed with concrete floor
- 6x3m fernery
- Multiple alfresco options
- Oversized garage

Description:
ARTISTIC CHARM INSIDE AND OUT
Hidden from from the outside world behind a tall fence and serene garden, this solid-brick, two-storey home oozes character, warmth and eclectic style.
It offers two bedrooms and a bathroom on the upper level with main bedroom, renovated bathroom and extensive living areas on the ground floor.
Every room enjoys tranquil garden views – none more so than the formal lounge with big windows and a glazed door opening to the front garden. A lofty raked ceiling creates drama and a sense of space while high double-glazed windows fill the room with natural light and stained glass windows add a creative touch.
An inviting dining room lies beside the updated kitchen with its ample cabinetry, benches, gas cooktop, under-bench electric oven, dishwasher, walk-in pantry and cleverly concealed European-style laundry.
Large main bedroom is situated behind the bathroom and includes big walk-in robe, an extra cupboard with shelving and a glass door to the side garden.
A large study/second living room at the rear is lined with bookshelves and includes a cheery gas-log fire under a timber mantelpiece and access to the expansive private alfresco entertaining area. Be both impressed and de-stressed by the peaceful ambience under the vine-draped pergola overlooking productive vegetable gardens and fruit trees.
A spacious studio off the side courtyard is a work of art itself with plenty of natural light, sink with water for quick cleanups and canvas storage racks. Alternatively, it could be utilised as a teen retreat, workshop, office or rumpus/playroom.
Added external features include carport, two rainwater tanks with pumps and sprinkler system, chook run, 1.5Kw solar power.
Like the seasons, the garden is an ever-changing canvas of colour and form where you can lose yourself amid the stately ghost gums with colourful under plantings, paved sitting areas, meandering paths and tranquil fishponds.
Filled with artistic charm, this property is the perfect hideaway while still handy to Kangaroo Flat Railway Station, shops and Lansell Square shopping centre.

Description:
Living the high life!
Taking full advantage of panoramic views spanning city rooftops and forest canopies, this impeccably presented property awaits your inspection. Perched upon an oversized double garage that also encompasses a storeroom and plenty of workshop space, the residence is wrapped on 3 sides by a return verandah to enable further enjoyment of the vista. Double doors are an aptly grand entrance to an interior that perfectly combines a little grandeur with a welcoming family environment. Enormous living zones feature bay windows that frame the scenery and are attired in timeless new window furnishings. They share ducted natural gas heating as well as evaporative cooling with 3 big bedrooms and a study. Beyond the breakfast bar, a dishwasher and 900mm stainless steel stove indulge the cook in the convenience of modern appliances. As expected, the master bedroom has an ensuite and walk-in robe, while other bedrooms contain built-in robes. The study as a potential 4th, nursery or guest room is a huge bonus, but it's ideally positioned for a home office or to supervise kid's internet usage. Landscaped grounds surround the home and incorporate a charming pond and built-in barbeque area. Ample room in the garage allows garden tools to be locked away at the end of the day. School, college and bus stops are just around the corner and shopping is within walking distance. Commuters will also appreciate the proximity to both the train station and highways. This lengthy list of attributes makes it highly likely that, unless you book your inspection now, 'those that snooze lose!'

Description:
5 bedroom home on corner lot with subdivision potential (STCA)
Set on a very generous 1141m2 corner lot with 3 lot subdivision potential (STCA), this spacious 5 bedroom house needs to go on the shopping list.
Whether you are an investor looking to value add or a first homebuyer / tradie with developmental potential on your mind, this could be for you. The 1970's Besser brick, split-level designed home has been recently painted and features a walk-in linen press and walk-in storage.
The main bedroom has an ensuite and walk-in robe, and all bedrooms have ceiling fans.
Climate can be controlled with a reverse-cycle unit plus the double bonus of a gas log heater and solid-fuel heater for winter ambiance.
The large yard includes a spacious timber deck with north facing living area and new colorbond fencing, great for entertaining.
There is a 2-car garage and access from both Browning and Aspinall streets.
Positioned in a very handy location, with a bus stop out the front in Browning Street, and a short walk to Kangaroo Flat primary school, Creche and Crusoe College.

Description:
Great value in a friendly neighborhood.
Neat, well maintained brick-veneer home is an ideal first home or investment property with plenty of room for grey nomads to park the caravan between trips.
It features three bedrooms - main with split system, two with built-in-robes and all with ceiling fans, updated bathroom and laundry. Spacious lounge includes gas heating and wall-mounted air conditioner, the kitchen is kitted out with gas stove, island bench, pantry cupboard and a great adjoining dining area with sliding doors to an outdoor deck.
The all-weather deck is the perfect spot for alfresco dining overlooking the secure rear garden.
The single carport has easy access to the backyard where there's a garden shed with power and concrete floor and ample room for a home extension or more shedding if desired (STCA).
Situated in a great neighbourhood with a playground across road, walking distance to Charcoal Gully Bushland Reserve, primary and secondary schools, Kanagroo Flat shops and public transport.
Step inside and discover value for money.

Description:
Gorgeous Townhouse on the Melbourne Side of Bendigo
This newly completed townhouse is a beautiful example of modern living. Stepping into the entry foyer you will instantly be impressed with how spacious the home feels. Neutral tones throughout will appeal to most as will the smart floor plan.
Features include:
Ground floor
• Study just inside the front entrance, ideal for those who work from home
• Huge living room, full of light coming from a highset window
• Open plan dining/kitchen/living.
• The kitchen is comprised of 600mm stainless steel electric oven and gas cooktop, dishwasher, double sink, pantry and plenty
of space for dining table.
• Off the dining, through glass sliding doors is a concreted area for outdoor entertaining.
• Laundry and conveniently, a toilet with its own vanity, access from the double garage with remote roller door.
Top floor
• 2nd living area with highset windows
• Main bedroom with walk in robe and ensuite comprising of double vanity, shower and toilet
• Bedrooms 2 and 3 both have built in robes
• Main bathroom with bath, shower and vanity
• Separate toilet
Climate control is catered for by way of ducted evaporative cooling and gas ducted heating. The allotment is 287m2 in total, fully fenced and ready for landscaping.
Close to Lansell Square shopping centre, Kangaroo Flat CBD, schools, child care, medical facilities, public transport, parks and recreation areas including the new Kangaroo Flat Leisure Centre when it is complete.
First home buyers are eligible to take advantage of the stamp duty savings!
